apple_vendor_description: This tender emoji on Apple devices captures a romantic moment between a man with a medium-light skin tone and a woman with a light skin tone, leaning in for a kiss, with a small red heart hovering nearby. Appleâ€™s renowned 3D design language brings a sense of depth and realism to their faces and figures, featuring soft, rounded edges and gentle, realistic lighting that highlights their affectionate expressions. The heart emoji, rendered with a glossy finish, amplifies the feeling of love and intimacy. On Apple devices, this emoji is a sweet and direct way to express romantic affection, passion, and deep fondness.
